ygData.subject: MIME type vs. MIME media type vs. Internet media type
ygData.msgSnippet: I did a cheat sheet summarizing my current understanding of MIME types.  However, while doing so, I noticed that there are several ways they are referred to,

Subject: MIME type vs. MIME media type vs. Internet media type
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=292691042; y=MDSyeUTU5wSaWQHaIxj5e-9A3QFMoboJdqR0kOmNKTiCVP91RAk
X-Yahoo-Profile: steve_bjorg

I did a cheat sheet summarizing my current understanding of MIME  
types.  However, while doing so, I noticed that there are several ways  
they are referred to, namely:
* MIME Type
* MIME Media Type
* Internet Media Type

So, I'm wondering, are these synonyms or are there subtle differences?

The summary can be found at:
http://restpatterns.org/Glossary/MIME_Type

- Steve
